"Wright":
"Oh, wow, I had no idea it would be this
high up! Well, as long as I don't look down...
Yes, yes, I'll look anywhere but down."

"W-Well, shall we begin, <%me>?
Oh, but could we take it slow and easy,
please?"

"うひゃあ、ずいぶん高いところですね！
下を見ないように……
下を見ないように……！"

"そ、それじゃ行きましょうか
<%me>さん。
どうぞ、お手柔らかに……！"
